entry.title: ROSEBURG BIG LOTS TO PERMANENTLY CLOSE IN JANUARY
entry.summary: November 2024 3:40 a.m. In the KQEN Business Spotlight: The Roseburg Big Lots store will permanently close in January. The discount retailer filed for bankruptcy earlier this fall, saying it planned to close roughly 550 stores. National media reports from multiple outlets said by mid-October, more than 240 stores had closed. As of November 19th,...

entry.title: Umpqua Banks holds Warm Hearts Winter Drive

entry.summary: Roseburg kids brushed up on their chemistry skills by making slime and putty during a S.T.E.A.M. (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Math) activity event Thursday at Roseburg Public Library.

entry.title: Nevada man allegedly steals another truck upon release from jail.
entry.summary: Steven Timothy Gant, of Reno is back in Douglas County Jail after continuing his journey home by allegedly stealing another vehicle Wednesday. Gant was initially arrested Monday night in possession of a truck stolen from Washington according to police.

entry.title: Elkton Art and Wine Weekend returns for 14th year
entry.summary: For those in Douglas County looking for another way to welcome in the holiday season after Thanksgiving, Elkton will be hosting the 14th Annual Art and Wine Weekend to show off the community's artisan goods and viticulture.
